posts.post_content: Combos with [Darien, King of Kjeldor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darien, King of Kjeldor) and [Soul Warden](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soul Warden), in much the same way as [Pandemonium](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pandemonium). [Pandemonium](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pandemonium) is better and more fun, but also more suicidal.

Posted By: Salient (5/26/2012 1:54:04 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Okay. This is my opinion on this card. It's good for dealing damage, but not good for decks that depend on cards like [Elbrus, the Binding Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elbrus, the Binding Blade) (unless you play Opalescence). This card is good for monored token-generating decks. Maybe some decks with roughly half-and-half color distribution. But definitely not splashable. I like it in my new [Krenko, Mob Boss](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Krenko, Mob Boss) goblin deck, which I altered significantly.
posts.html:

This card is good for monored token-generating decks. Maybe some decks with roughly half-and-half color distribution. But definitely not splashable.
